name: py-starlette

description: The little ASGI library that shines.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-anyio
dependencies.description:
High level compatibility layer for multiple asynchronous event loop
implementations.

dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions
dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).

dependent_to.name: py-fastapi

FastAPI framework, high performance, easy to learn, fast to code, ready
for production

dependent_to.description:
Use Lightning Apps to build everything from production-ready, multi-
cloud ML systems to simple research demos.

dependent_to.name: py-starsessions
